summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing the need for Staley to agree on compensation guidelines with another individual. Epstein warns Staley about the risks of being portrayed negatively in future dealings. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, advising Jes Staley on compensation guidelines.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, receiving advice from Epstein regarding compensation agreements.

connections.description: Epstein is advising Staley on business matters, indicating a level of trust and collaboration.

keyFacts: The email discusses the need for Jes Staley to agree on compensation guidelines with another individual.
Epstein warns Staley about the potential risks of being portrayed negatively in future dealings.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
